attributes.name: NOAA GEFS analysis
attributes.description: Weather analysis from the Global Ensemble Forecast System (GEFS) operated by NOAA NWS NCEP.
attributes.attribution: NOAA NWS NCEP GEFS data processed by dynamical.org from NOAA Open Data Dissemination archives.

attributes.comment: Average value in the last 6 hour period (00, 06, 12, 18 UTC) or 3 hour period (03, 09, 15, 21 UTC).
Average value in the last 6 hour period (00, 06, 12, 18 UTC) or 3 hour period (03, 09, 15, 21 UTC).
Average precipitation rate since the previous forecast step.

This coordinate reference system matches the source data which follows WMO conventions of assuming the earth is a perfect sphere with a radius of 6,371,229m. It is similar to EPSG:4326, but EPSG:4326 uses a more accurate representation of the earth's shape.
Average value in the last 6 hour period (00, 06, 12, 18 UTC) or 3 hour period (03, 09, 15, 21 UTC).
All lead times of this variable are interpolated from a 0.5 degree grid.
All lead times of this variable are interpolated from a 0.5 degree grid.
